org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class ColorSchemesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.ColorSchemesUtil

  • final class ColorSchemesUtil
extends Object
    Color scheme utility to cache the usage of color schemes in order to avoid to search them when requested.
    Used by ColorSchemes.ID plugin.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • hasColorScheme

        boolean hasColorScheme(String category,
                       String name)
        Returns true if the color scheme, retrievable by category and name, is stored in the cache.
        Parameters:
        category - color scheme category
        name - color scheme name
        Returns:
        true if in the cache otherwise false
